content.html: Buying, wearing, and tweeting to 14 million people a picture of yourself wearing a t-shirt that attacks and makes slanderous claims about one specific woman is exactly the kind of online bullying JK Rowling claims to be against. She has Instigated a 14m pile on on one person.
content.value:
Buying, wearing, and tweeting to 14 million people a picture of yourself wearing a t-shirt that attacks and makes slanderous claims about one specific woman is exactly the kind of online bullying JK Rowling claims to be against.
She has Instigated a 14m pile on on one person.
